p: Determination of the antimicrobial activity was performed according to Jirovetz et al. [ 49]. Test-microorganism (concentration ~1 × 10 7 cfu/cm 3) suspension was spread on the Luria–Bertani medium with glucose (LBG) agar (LB Broth, Miller–Novagen, Merck, Germany) in plates. Agar disc-diffusion method using 6 mm paper discs, containing 6 μL of the test extract at a desired concentration. After 24–48 h of sample incubation at 37 °C for bacteria and 30 °C for yeast and fungi, the diameter of the inhibition zone (IZ) was measured in millimetres.
